name: The Missing Ring
overview: The Missing Ring is a computer role-playing game written by Terry Romine for the Apple II and published in 1982 by Datamost. he Missing Ring is a fantasy adventure game with a similar premise to the Dungeons & Dragons role-playing game series—a band of adventurers, which may include humans, elves, dwarves or wizards, enters an enchanted palace to seek treasure and slay enemies. The ultimate objective is to find a wizard's ancient ring.
